title: China-focused hedge funds surged in 2025. Here's who won big.
full_text: China-focused hedge funds surged in 2025. Here's who won big.. The average fund invested in China in 2025 made close to 18%, according to Hedge Fund Research.. Chinese leader Xi Jinping and his ruling party have pushed to stimulate China's economy.Xie Huanchi/Xinhua via Getty Images <ul><li>Hedge funds betting big on China generated strong returns last yea… [+2934 chars]
